Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Safety Critical
b) Defect Observed: Fuel control unit drift. Malfunction reported by flight crew.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Software algorithm error in control logic implementation
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Compressor Section component. Testing
confirmed performance below acceptable limits.
c) Remedial Measures Conduct detailed inspection of all similar components in fleet
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Conduct fleet-wide inspection campaign
d) Attributable Code: N2 - Defect Not Confirmed
Remarks: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Technical evaluation completed. Proposed preventive measures are appropriate and align with design intent.
Date: 27/03/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Eng. R.P. Singh
